snippet: An ethnic Uighur farmer has been detained and accused of killing five people and wounding seven in a knife attack on March 7 in Korla, according to a report on Friday.
abstract: Aizitiali Mamuti, ethnic Uighur Farmer, is detained by Chinese authorities and accused of killing five people and wounding seven in March knife attack in Korla, center of oil production in western region of Xinjiang.
lead_paragraph: An ethnic Uighur farmer has been detained and accused of killing five people and wounding seven in a knife attack on March 7 in Korla, according to a report on Friday.
